participant_1.background:
I like to dance at the club.
I run a dog obedience school.
I have a big sweet tooth.
I just bought a brand new house.

participant_2.background:
I like dark superhero movies.
I like to drink scotch to relax.
I am afraid of dogs.
I used to work at a carnival.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I just moved into the neighborhood and I'm looking for some new friends.
Hi, I'm participant_2. Welcome to the neighborhood! I'm not sure if I can be your friend, but I can tell you a little bit about myself.
That would be great! I like to know about people.
Well, I like dark superhero movies, I like to drink scotch to relax, and I'm afraid of dogs.
I like dark superhero movies too! I also like to drink, but I prefer beer. I'm not afraid of dogs, but I don't really like them either.
That's interesting. I've never met anyone who doesn't like dogs before.
I know, it's kind of weird. I've just never really had a good experience with dogs.
Well, I'm sure you'll find some friends who like dogs here.
I hope so! I'm really trying to get out and meet new people.
I know the feeling. Moving to a new place can be tough. But it's also a great opportunity to meet new people and start fresh.
I'm trying to look at it that way.
That's the spirit! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go dancing at the club. I also like to play video games and read books.
I love to dance too! But I'm not much of a gamer. I do like to read, though.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read mystery novels and historical fiction.
I love historical fiction too! I'm reading a book about the Roman Empire right now.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good book.
Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. It's been nice talking to you.
Me too. Maybe we could hang out sometime?
That would be fun! I'm free next weekend.
Me too! We could go to the movies or something.
That sounds like a plan. I'll send you a message when I know what time.
Great! I'll see you then.
